descriptionNullable:
### Context

Corals are an integral part of aquatic life and their bleaching is causing unbalanced scenarios in aquatic life. So detecting bleached corals at early stages prevents aquatic life from disaster.
### Content

This dataset contains images of bleached and unbleached corals.

### Acknowledgements

We wouldn't be here without the help of others. This dataset was created for the research and experimental purposes of a manuscript titled "Bag of Features (BoF) Based Deep Learning Framework for Bleached Corals Detection".

### Reference

If you use this dataset for experimental or research purposes please give credit to the authors by citing the following article.
Jamil, S.; Rahman, M.; Haider, A. Bag of Features (BoF) Based Deep Learning Framework for Bleached Corals Detection. *Big Data Cogn. Comput.* **2021**, 5, 53. https://doi.org/10.3390/bdcc5040053
title: Bleached and Unbleached Corals Classification
subtitle: Coral Bleaching Detection
